title: Loving Hut - Desheng Jilin
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for vegetarian living. Serving food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and more. 吉林市船营区德胜门越山路102号. (女子学校南走150米对面）. Chinese Name: 爱家.
streetAddress: No.102, Yueshan Rd., Jiewei 1st Building, Desheng Block, Chuanying District
